creatures.name: Bumble-Dog
creatures.description: Fox-hare hybrids with antennae. They mimic human speech and hunt in packs. Friendly but distracting.

creatures.name: Clinger
creatures.special: Surprise Attack, blinds and auto-damages while attached.
creatures.description: Crustacean husks that leap and cling to faces. Auto-damage until removed.

creatures.name: Giant Flea
creatures.description: Huge fleas that leap from sand. Surprise prey and bite continuously until killed.

creatures.name: Insectus, Brain Bug
creatures.description: 60-foot psychic slugs. Psychic static causes unconsciousness or -2 To-Hit for 1 turn.

creatures.name: Insectus, Fliers
creatures.description: Airborne attackers that drop captured prey from heights, causing 3d6 damage.

creatures.name: Insectus, Soldier
creatures.description: Basic swarming foot soldiers of the Insectus horde.

creatures.name: Living Asteroid
creatures.description: Massive void creatures that attack ships, treated with Starship rules. Often mistaken for real asteroids.

creatures.name: Mercurial
creatures.description: Chrome-like ooze that destroys tech and deals automatic damage while engulfing targets.

creatures.name: Mind Grub
creatures.description: Tiny parasites that surprise on a 1–5 and devour victims' brains from within.

creatures.name: Polaris
creatures.special: Combustible Touch, Immune to explosions and energy damage
creatures.description: Living fire that explodes flammable items but is immune to all energy damage.

creatures.name: Power Sucker
creatures.description: Disruptive pests that reduce starship Movement when attached.

creatures.name: Radfish
creatures.description: Irradiated aquatic beasts. Inflict 1d6 radiation damage to unprotected targets per round.

creatures.name: Sand Worm
creatures.description: Large worms that burrow under sand to ambush prey. Range from 15 to hundreds of feet long.

creatures.name: Skytopus
creatures.description: Octopus-like flying beasts with beaks and melodic humming sounds. Carrion feeders.

creatures.name: Space Monkey
creatures.special: Scream causes deafness (Save or be deaf for 1 hour)
creatures.description: Blue-furred chimps with antennae that scream painfully when threatened.

creatures.name: Spider-Fly
creatures.description: Massive web-building predators with paralyzing bites. Known to drag paralyzed prey into high-altitude webs.

creatures.name: Stellar Dragon
creatures.special: Breath Weapon (equal to max HP), Immune to Meditations & Gifts, Survives in space
creatures.description: Mythic space serpents with solar radiation breath. Immune to magic and capable of damaging starships.

creatures.name: Thunder Lizard
creatures.description: Colossal magma-breathing monsters from ocean depths. Wield claws, bite, and molten breath.
